languages.text: "Но как? Все наше время и все наши мысли должны же быть направлены на служение Истине Изначальной и сотворение ее детей-машин".
"But how? All our time and all our thoughts must be devoted to serving the Primordial Truth and the creation of its machine offspring."
languages.original_text: "Но как? Все наше время и все наши мысли должны же быть направлены на служение Истине Изначальной и сотворение ее детей-машин".

traits.locale_text: "But how? All our time and all our thoughts must be devoted to serving the Primordial Truth and the creation of its machine offspring."
"But how? All our time and all our thoughts must be devoted to serving the Primordial Truth and the creation of its machine offspring."
"But how? All our time and all our thoughts must be devoted to serving the Primordial Truth and the creation of its machine offspring."
"But how? All our time and all our thoughts must be devoted to serving the Primordial Truth and the creation of its machine offspring."
"But how? All our time and all our thoughts must be devoted to serving the Primordial Truth and the creation of its machine offspring."

languages.text: “但该怎么做？我们所有的时间与思想，都必须致力于服侍原初真理，创造原初真理的机器子嗣。”
languages.original_text: "But how? All our time and all our thoughts must be devoted to serving the Primordial Truth and the creation of its machine offspring."

traits.locale_text: “但该怎么做？我们所有的时间与思想，都必须致力于服侍原初真理，创造原初真理的机器子嗣。”

languages.text: «Pero ¿cómo? Debemos dedicar todo nuestro tiempo y nuestros pensamientos al servicio de la Verdad Primordial y a la creación de su progenie mecánica».
languages.original_text: "But how? All our time and all our thoughts must be devoted to serving the Primordial Truth and the creation of its machine offspring."

traits.locale_text: «Pero ¿cómo? Debemos dedicar todo nuestro tiempo y nuestros pensamientos al servicio de la Verdad Primordial y a la creación de su progenie mecánica».

languages.text: 「でもどうやって？時間も思考も全て捧げて、原初の真実とその機械の子孫を生むことに尽くさなければならないというのに」
languages.original_text: "But how? All our time and all our thoughts must be devoted to serving the Primordial Truth and the creation of its machine offspring."

traits.locale_text: 「でもどうやって？時間も思考も全て捧げて、原初の真実とその機械の子孫を生むことに尽くさなければならないというのに」

languages.text: "Aber wie? All unsere Zeit und Gedanken müssen der Primordialen Wahrheit und der Schöpfung ihrer Maschinennachfahren gewidmet sein."
languages.original_text: "But how? All our time and all our thoughts must be devoted to serving the Primordial Truth and the creation of its machine offspring."

traits.locale_text: "Aber wie? All unsere Zeit und Gedanken müssen der Primordialen Wahrheit und der Schöpfung ihrer Maschinennachfahren gewidmet sein."

languages.text: « Mais comment ? Nous devons consacrer tout notre temps et nos pensées au service de la Vérité Primordiale et à la création de sa progéniture mécanique. »
languages.original_text: "But how? All our time and all our thoughts must be devoted to serving the Primordial Truth and the creation of its machine offspring."

traits.locale_text: « Mais comment ? Nous devons consacrer tout notre temps et nos pensées au service de la Vérité Primordiale et à la création de sa progéniture mécanique. »

languages.text: "İyi de nasıl? Zamanımız ve zihnimiz, Ezelî Hakikat'in emrine amadedir. Benliğimizi, ona ve makine fürusunun yaratımına adamak zorundayız."
languages.original_text: "But how? All our time and all our thoughts must be devoted to serving the Primordial Truth and the creation of its machine offspring."

traits.locale_text: "Peki nasıl? Zamanımız ve zihnimiz, Ezelî Hakikat'in emrine amade. Benliğimizi, ona ve makine fürusunun yaratımına adamak zorundayız."
